camera.coffee.description: Save a snap of enabled cameras to the data folder every 10 minutes.
Delete old camera snaps twice a day.

electricimp.coffee.description: Probe Electric Imp device sensors every 2 minutes.

fitbit.coffee.description: Check general fitness levels once a day.
Notify missing sleep data from Fitbit once a day.

hue.coffee.description: Refresh Philips Hue hub data every minute.

netatmo.coffee.description: Probe current outdoor conditions every 5 minutes.
Probe current indoor conditions every 3 minutes.

network.coffee.description: Probe network devices and update their statuses every minute.
Probe network router to check for online users every 30 seconds.

ninja.coffee.description: Probe Ninja Blocks device list every hour.

wunderground.coffee.description: Get updated weather information every 10 minutes.
Get updated astronomy (sunrise, sunset, moon) every day.
